name: Tropical Spotted Fever
chief_complaint: I've had a high fever and these weird red spots all over my body for the past 5 days
prognosis: Excellent with timely treatment, though convalescence may take 2-3 weeks. Untreated cases risk severe complications.
description: An acute febrile illness caused by Rickettsia africae transmitted through tick bites in tropical regions. Characterized by eschar at bite site (when present), fever, and distinctive rash. Incubation period 5-7 days.
risk_factors: exposure to cattle or game animals
